page.title: 08THE CORNER SHOP.
page.content: The corner shop on Woodfield Road is open from 8.30 a.m.to 7.00 p.m., six days a week, serving people from the local community. Each morning there are deliveries of fresh bread, cream cakes, milk and vegetables. Other items for sale are bought from large wholesale stores twice a week. The value of the goods normally in stock is Â£12,000. During the day the shopkeeper and her staff keep the shelves filled, cut the cold meats and serve the customers. From a survey carried out recently it was discovered that Monday was the busiest day. Elderly people enjoy visiting the shop because of the friendly atmosphere. If they are ill and not able to do their own shopping the shopkeeper will deliver their orders and spend a little time with them.
